articles.description: ”We know that when you go into an airport, you are with lots of people from all over, different places, whether it's domestically or internationally,“ Dr. Sundari Mase, the county’s public health officer, said.

articles.title: Children produce different antibodies in response to SARS-CoV-2 - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Children and adults produce different types and amounts of antibodies in response to infection with the new coronavirus, SARS-CoV-2, a new study from researchers at Columbia University Vagelos College of Physicians and Surgeons has found.
